cast.overview: World War II is raging, and an American general has been captured and is being held hostage in the Schloss Adler, a Bavarian castle that's nearly impossible to breach. It's up to a group of skilled Allied soldiers to liberate the general before it's too late.
cast.title: Where Eagles Dare

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Eileen Mary Ure (born 18 February 1933, Glasgow, Scotland - died 3 April 1975, London) was a Scottish actress of stage and film.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Mary Ure, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Mary Ure
